sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The exim package contains exim, exim_dumpdb, exim_fixdb, exim_tidydb, exinext, exiwhat, exim_dbmbuild, exicyclog, exigrep, eximstats, exiqsumm, exim_lock and exim_checkaccess.

sect3.title: exim
sect3.para: exim is the Mail Transport Agent daemon.

sect3.title: exim_dumpdb
sect3.para: exim_dumpdb writes the contents of exim databases to the standard output .

sect3.title: exim_fixdb
sect3.para: exim_fixdb modifies data in exim databases.

sect3.title: exim_tidydb
sect3.para: exim_tidydb removes old records from exim databases.

sect3.title: exinext
sect3.para: exinext queries remote host retry times.

sect3.title: exim_dbmbuild
sect3.para: exim_dbmbuild creates and rebuilds exim databases.

sect3.title: eximstats
sect3.para: eximstats generates mail statistics from exim log files.

sect3.title: exiqsumm
sect3.para: exiqsumm produces a summary of the messages on the mail queue.

sect3.title: exim_checkaccess
sect3.para: exim_checkaccess states whether a given recipient address from a given host is acceptable or not.
